Html:
Hello. I have a problem of Club Starter Kit. I would like to use the kit under Chinese Character, so I had made some restructure of code and DB.
1. I had changed all Database fileds which used "varchar" to "nvarchar".
2. I had changed dataset anistring to string.

still can not be sloved.....cant see chinese in "member/list.aspx"

As a result, the Chinsese character can not be show in membership page. the pictures of this problem:
http://img.rcfans.com/day070703/20070703955356cb3c862fb1533aFeHtKEqHMzYQ.jpg

Regards,
Bamboo
